::Spears::

She sat down in the pod. "OUCH!" 
She was rubbing her backside. She looked at Ramulus, blushing.
"I sat on one of my own quills.  That smarts." she said with her face 
turning a deep red.
She sat back down, this time without sitting on her quills. 

"Uh, I was just wondering, how long is this flight? I didn't mind 
flying in the stasis pod because I was out cold.  But I..ah..just 
please hurry and fly us there. OK?"

Now she felt really stupid.  Who ever heard of a fearless warrior 
being a fraid of heights.
